PathButton¶

class pyqtgraph.PathButton(parent=None, path=None, pen='default', brush=None, size=(30, 30), margin=7)[source]¶

Simple PushButton extension that paints a QPainterPath centered on its face.

__init__(parent=None, path=None, pen='default', brush=None, size=(30, 30), margin=7)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
